channel.title: Golden Cobra 2019 is Live
channel.description:
[The Golden Cobra Challenge](http://www.goldencobra.org/) is live and wow is this year exciting!
* Interesting award categories, including a distributed/synchronous one that may appeal to Gauntleteers who live and play in the online space anyway. * Goofy optional ingredients, including a cardboard box and fighting Fascism. * For the first time ever there is a guest judge, and it is a really great one.
I'm on the committee (not a judge this year) and would be glad to answer questions.
